price: (Dubbichi) akka kana, Wantoota isa bira jiran dhugumatti, beekumsaan marsineerra.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
